law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 358, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1997. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 350, sec. 3, effective April 10, 1988. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 423, sec. 7, effective July 1, 1987.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/96). Under 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 358, sec. 67(1), the amendment of this statute by Section 12 of that Act becomes effective July 15, 1997.
